Dickson Nnamdi Iroegbu bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Naijiria
Ọ duziri ma mepụta ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood

N'afọ 2005, na mbipụta mbụ nke African Movie Academy Awards, Iroegbu ritere ihe nrite atọ maka ihe nkiri ya a kpọrọ The Mayors, nke gụnyere ihe nrite maka Best Picture, Best Screenplay na Best Director.
